overview: Eager to launch their crotch rockets, our sexed-up rascals find non-stop thrills in this 24/7 party town. Las Vegas really is Sin City for this new group of horny guys aiming to score big. The lights burn brighter, the action is electrifying, and their devil-may-care attitude is explosive. Watch these young dudes throw caution – and all inhibition – out the window.
title: Road Trip 10: Las Vegas
